title: Rebrand application to Narie with floral elegance theme

requirements.text: Update the application name to 'Narie' throughout the frontend, including the HTML title, header navigation, and any other visible branding elements
acceptanceCriteria: The header navigation shows 'Narie' as the brand name
All references to 'Clothing Store' are replaced with 'Narie'

requirements.text: Add the motto 'Elegance in Floral' as a tagline visible on the homepage and/or header, positioned elegantly near the brand name

quotes: The moto is elegance in floral

acceptanceCriteria: The tagline 'Elegance in Floral' appears on the homepage
The typography and placement complement the brand identity
The tagline is styled with elegant, refined typography

requirements.text: Integrate the uploaded brand logo images (featuring the decorative gold floral emblem with teal accent and 'NARIE' text) as static assets throughout the application, including the header, favicon, and hero section
acceptanceCriteria: The Narie logo with floral emblem appears in the header navigation
The favicon uses the Narie brand logo
The logo maintains its elegant gold and teal color scheme
Logo images are properly sized and optimized for web display

requirements.text: Update the hero section heading from 'Timeless Elegance' to align with the Narie brand identity and 'Elegance in Floral' motto, ensuring the new heading reflects the floral elegance theme
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section heading reflects the Narie brand and floral elegance theme
The heading typography maintains the elegant, refined aesthetic
The heading complements the 'Elegance in Floral' motto

requirements.text: Refine the visual theme to incorporate floral elegance, using colors inspired by the uploaded logo (gold tones, teal accents, cream background) and ensuring the warm earth tone palette is adjusted to emphasize botanical sophistication
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette includes gold/golden tones and teal accents inspired by the logo
The cream/beige background from the logo informs the overall color scheme
Typography and spacing convey botanical elegance
The design feels cohesive with the floral motif theme

constraints: Preserve the existing warm earth tone color system while incorporating gold and teal accents
Do not modify the backend actor or any backend logic
Do not edit immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity hooks, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Adding new product features or functionality
Changing the shopping cart or checkout flow

required: Hero banner background image with soft floral motifs in gold and teal on cream background, elegant and sophisticated (hero-floral.dim_1920x800.png)
